name: gusplease

name: riazm
text: Todd desperately wants Billy Idol to understand that he is not a novice in the ways of Cuss. He is experienced in this field and subscribed to many journals.

name: coldfrog
text: He is not, however, shaking because he is mad at being told what he already knows.  Billy Idol's explanation is cutting into his cocaine time.

name: lateadopter
text: Despite being crass and illiterate, Todd is a leading expert in things that matter . You have to respect that.

name: evolume

name: farqussus
text: and RELEVANCE

name: lucid
text:
It is relevant. There are scientific experiments which prove that unborn children cry in the presence of cusses.

Granted there are few follow up studies that corroborate these findings, as the initial experiments were branded unethical and cannot be repeated.

Fucking crybabies.

name: hughnin
text: This is one of the most saddest/hilarious things I have ever heard in my life. Great job.

name: bixschmix
text: Alt Text: Roast Beef did so many things while I tried to write this strip. In the end he stayed on the moon.

text: I'm trying to picture "Saying cusses is power" in Billy Idol's voice, but it always comes as that guy who does 'Wild Discovery'.
